title: Number of earthquakes , by country 1900 to 2016
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of earthquakes for 12 number of Countrys.
The maximum Number of earthquakes 157.0 is found at Country China and the minimum is found at Afghanistan where Number of earthquakes is 32.0.
The highest value at Country China is 4.91x times more than the lowest value at Afghanistan.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of earthquakes for 12 number of Countrys.
Country China has the highest Number of earthquakes and Afghanistan has the lowest Number of earthquakes.
Country  has the second highest value for Number of earthquakes.
The difference of Number of earthquakes between the highest and lowest Country is 125.0.
Number of earthquakes at Country China is 157.0 , second place is  at 157.0, and thirdly is Iran (Islamic Republic of) at 106.0.
Country Afghanistan, India, Greece, and Mexico have the same Number of earthquakes.
The highest value 157.0 at China is almost 2.48 times larger than the average value 63.33.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 760.0.
